sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 18 patients with SRMs were analyzed and summarized retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾性总结分析18例蝶骨嵴脑膜瘤的临床资料。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the microsurgical technique in managing medial sphenoid ridge meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨内侧型蝶骨嵴脑膜瘤显微手术技巧。

sentences.english: Objective To intend to rise operation effect of sphenoid ridge meningiomas (SRMs).
sentences.chinese: 目的进一步提高蝶骨嵴脑膜瘤的手术疗效。

sentences.english: The most likely cause of sphenoid dysplasia is defective ossification of the sphenoid bone.
sentences.chinese: 引起蝶骨发育不良最可能的原因是蝶骨骨化不全。

sentences.english: The most likely cause of sphenoid dysplasia is defective ossification of the sphenoid bone.
sentences.chinese: 引起蝶骨发育不良最可能的原因是蝶骨骨化不全。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of the surgical treatment of sphenoid ridge meningiomas.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结蝶骨嵴脑膜瘤手术治疗的经验与体会。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical treatment of medial sphenoid ridge meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨内侧型蝶骨嵴脑膜瘤手术治疗。

definition: bones of the temple (on the human head)/see 顳顬|颞颥, temple
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
vomer bone (in the nose, dividing the nostrils)
